member.name: Windows.WcmFreeMemory
member.summary: The WcmFreeMemory function is used to release memory resources allocated by the WCM functions.
member.param: Pointer to the memory to be freed.

member.name: Windows.WcmGetProfileList
member.summary: The WcmGetProfileList function retrieves a list of profiles in preferred order, descending from the most preferred to the least preferred. The list includes all WCM-managed auto-connect profiles across all WCM-managed media types.
member.returns: Returns ERROR_SUCCESS if successful, or an error value otherwise.

member.name: Windows.WcmQueryProperty
member.summary: The WcmQueryProperty function retrieves the value of a specified WCM property.
member.param: The interface to query. For global properties, this parameter is NULL.
The name of the profile. If querying a non-global property (connection_cost, dataplan_status, or hotspot_profile), the profile must be specified or the call will fail.
The size of the returned property value.
member.returns: Returns ERROR_SUCCESS if successful, or an error value otherwise.

member.name: Windows.WcmSetProfileList
member.summary: The WcmSetProfileList function reorders a profile list or a subset of a profile list.
member.param: The list of profiles to be reordered, provided in the preferred order (descending from the most preferred to the least preferred).
Specifies the position in the list to start the reorder.

True if any profiles in pProfileList which do not exist should be ignored; the call will proceed with the remainder of the list. False if the call should fail without modifying the profile order if any profiles in pProfileList do not exist.
member.returns: Returns ERROR_SUCCESS if successful, or an error value otherwise.

member.name: Windows.WcmSetProperty
member.summary: The WcmSetProperty function sets the value of a WCM property.
member.param: The interface to set. For global properties, this parameter is NULL.
The size of the new property value.
member.returns: Returns ERROR_SUCCESS if successful, or an error value otherwise.
